name.th: ความเร็วในการเล่น Spotify

short.ar: يضيف زرًا وقائمة للتحكم في سرعة التشغيل على Spotify Web.
short.am: በSpotify ድር ላይ የመልሶ ማጫወት ፍጥነትን ለመቆጣጠር ቁልፍ እና ሜኑ ያክላል።
short.bg: Добавя бутон и меню за манипулиране на скоростта на възпроизвеждане в Spotify Web.
short.bn: Spotify ওয়েবে প্লেব্যাকের গতি নিয়ন্ত্রণ করতে একটি বোতাম এবং মেনু যোগ করে।
short.ca: Afegeix un botó i un menú per manipular la velocitat de reproducció a Spotify Web.
short.cs: Přidá tlačítko a nabídku pro manipulaci s rychlostí přehrávání na webu Spotify.
short.da: Tilføjer en knap og en menu til at manipulere afspilningshastigheden på Spotify Web.
short.de: Fügt eine Schaltfläche und ein Menü hinzu, um die Wiedergabegeschwindigkeit auf Spotify Web zu manipulieren.
short.el: Προσθέτει ένα κουμπί και ένα μενού για τον χειρισμό της ταχύτητας αναπαραγωγής στο Spotify Web.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US: Adds a button and menu to manipulate playback speed on Spotify Web.
short.es,es_419: Agrega un botón y un menú para manipular la velocidad de reproducción en Spotify Web.
short.et: Lisab nupu ja menüü taasesituse kiiruse muutmiseks Spotify Webis.
short.fa: یک دکمه و منو برای دستکاری سرعت پخش در Spotify Web اضافه می کند.
short.fi: Lisää painikkeen ja valikon toistonopeuden muokkaamiseen Spotify Webissä.
short.fil: Nagdaragdag ng button at menu para manipulahin ang bilis ng pag-playback sa Spotify Web.
short.fr: Ajoute un bouton et un menu pour manipuler la vitesse de lecture sur Spotify Web.
short.gu: Spotify વેબ પર પ્લેબેક સ્પીડમાં ફેરફાર કરવા માટે એક બટન અને મેનૂ ઉમેરે છે.
short.he: מוסיף לחצן ותפריט כדי לתפעל את מהירות ההשמעה ב-Spotify Web.
short.hi: Spotify वेब पर प्लेबैक गति में हेरफेर करने के लिए एक बटन और मेनू जोड़ता है।
short.hr: Dodaje gumb i izbornik za upravljanje brzinom reprodukcije na Spotify Webu.
short.hu: Hozzáad egy gombot és menüt a lejátszási sebesség módosításához a Spotify Weben.
short.id: Menambahkan tombol dan menu untuk memanipulasi kecepatan pemutaran di Spotify Web.
short.it: Aggiunge un pulsante e un menu per manipolare la velocità di riproduzione su Spotify Web.
short.ja: Spotify Web で再生速度を操作するボタンとメニューを追加します。
short.kn: Spotify ವೆಬ್‌ನಲ್ಲಿ ಪ್ಲೇಬ್ಯಾಕ್ ವೇಗವನ್ನು ಕುಶಲತೆಯಿಂದ ನಿರ್ವಹಿಸಲು ಬಟನ್ ಮತ್ತು ಮೆನುವನ್ನು ಸೇರಿಸುತ್ತದೆ.
short.ko: Spotify Web에서 재생 속도를 조작할 수 있는 버튼과 메뉴를 추가합니다.
short.lt: Pridedamas mygtukas ir meniu, kad būtų galima valdyti „Spotify Web“ atkūrimo greitį.
short.lv: Pievieno pogu un izvēlni, lai manipulētu ar atskaņošanas ātrumu Spotify Web.
short.ml: Spotify വെബിൽ പ്ലേബാക്ക് വേഗത കൈകാര്യം ചെയ്യാൻ ഒരു ബട്ടണും മെനുവും ചേർക്കുന്നു.
short.mr: Spotify वेबवर प्लेबॅक गती हाताळण्यासाठी बटण आणि मेनू जोडते.
short.ms: Menambah butang dan menu untuk memanipulasi kelajuan main balik pada Spotify Web.
short.nl: Voegt een knop en menu toe om de afspeelsnelheid op Spotify Web te manipuleren.
short.no: Legger til en knapp og meny for å manipulere avspillingshastigheten på Spotify Web.
short.pl: Dodaje przycisk i menu umożliwiające manipulowanie szybkością odtwarzania w Spotify Web.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Adiciona um botão e menu para manipular a velocidade de reprodução no Spotify Web.
short.ro: Adaugă un buton și un meniu pentru a manipula viteza de redare pe Spotify Web.
short.ru: Добавляет кнопку и меню для управления скоростью воспроизведения в Spotify Web.
short.sk: Pridáva tlačidlo a ponuku na ovládanie rýchlosti prehrávania na webe Spotify.
short.sl: Doda gumb in meni za upravljanje hitrosti predvajanja na Spotify Web.
short.sr: Додаје дугме и мени за манипулисање брзином репродукције на Спотифи Веб-у.
short.sv: Lägger till en knapp och meny för att manipulera uppspelningshastigheten på Spotify Web.
short.sw: Huongeza kitufe na menyu ili kuchezea kasi ya kucheza kwenye Spotify Web.
short.ta: Spotify இணையத்தில் பிளேபேக் வேகத்தைக் கையாள பொத்தான் மற்றும் மெனுவைச் சேர்க்கிறது.
short.te: Spotify వెబ్‌లో ప్లేబ్యాక్ వేగాన్ని మార్చేందుకు బటన్ మరియు మెనుని జోడిస్తుంది.
short.th: เพิ่มปุ่มและเมนูเพื่อควบคุมความเร็วในการเล่นบน Spotify Web
short.tr: Spotify Web'de oynatma hızını değiştirmek için bir düğme ve menü ekler.
short.uk: Додає кнопку та меню для керування швидкістю відтворення в Spotify Web.
short.vi: Thêm nút và menu để điều chỉnh tốc độ phát lại trên Spotify Web.
short.zh_CN,zh_TW: 添加按钮和菜单来控制 Spotify Web 上的播放速度。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
Spotify Playback Speed Extension Allows You To Change Playback Speed Of  A Song On Spotify™ Web Player.

Installation Instructions:

1. Click on “Add to Chrome” button.
2. Then, click on “Add Extension” button prompted on screen.
3. Click on “Puzzle” icon on right hand side of Chrome bar.
4. Pin the extension as it should be blue pin in front of the extension name “Spotify Playback Speed”.
5. Play the music on open.spotify.com and you will find the icon of Playback Speed in Web Player.

DISCLAIMER:

Spotify is a trademark of Spotify Technology S.A., registered in the U.S. and other countries. This extension is an independent project and has no relationship to Spotify or Spotify Technology S.A.

This extension is against Spotify's Terms of Service.
long.en,en_AU,fil,id,ms,tr:
Spotify Playback Speed Extension Allows You To Change Playback Speed Of  A Song On Spotify™ Web Player.

Installation Instructions:

1. Click on “Add to Chrome” button.
2. Then, click on “Add Extension” button prompted on screen.
3. Click on “Puzzle” icon on right hand side of Chrome bar.
4. Pin the extension as it should be blue pin in front of the extension name “Spotify Playback Speed”.
5. Play the music on open.spotify.com and you will find the icon of Playback Speed in Web Player.

DISCLAIMER:

Spotify is a trademark of Spotify Technology S.A., registered in the U.S. and other countries. This extension is an independent project and has no relationship to Spotify or Spotify Technology S.A.

This extension is against Spotify's Terms of Service.

Disclosure/Consent:

Spotify Playback Speed enhances your browsing experience by providing useful features and participating in affiliate programs. This helps sustain the service without affecting the cost of your purchases. Explicit consent is required before any affiliate code is applied, and you have full control over this feature. Learn more in our Privacy Policy (https://www.spotifyplaybackspeed.com/privacy-policy/), Terms of Use (https://www.spotifyplaybackspeed.com/terms-of-use/), and Affiliate Disclosure (https://www.spotifyplaybackspeed.com/affiliate-disclosure/).

Thank you for choosing Spotify Playback Speed. We are committed to continually improving your online experience.
